item.title: Paving block sinkage and trip hazard in the alleyway pavement to Sainsbury's, High St Beckenham (between no.s 179 and 183, High St Beckenham., 12th June
item.description:
Paving block sinkage and trip hazard in the alleyway pavement to Sainsbury's, High St Beckenham (between no.s 179 and 183, High St Beckenham) . If this belongs to Sainsbury's, please forward the report to them in the public interest. This paving was paid for by the £4.4m Beckenham Public Realm Scheme.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61-63, Croydon Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Old bed fly tipped on Fingal Street, 11th June
item.description:
An old bed has been fly tipped at the top of Fingal Street where it joins the Woolwich Road. Please remove. This is not the first time that it happened. Notorious fly tipping spot. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fingal Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
